column5: Well, it sure was the warmest weather i've ever hunted in. The deer were not moving like they normally would for us, however we did manage to get a couple. I shot a Doe at 2 pm on the Monday, i think it was 16 degrees, at the time. Another fella in the gang got a buck with the some odd antlers on Thursday morning.  We hunt down in Niagara area, 89A and it was a good thing we new a guy with a walk in cooler (converted sea container with refer unit) to store the meat until we butchered on the Sunday. yum love the deer sausage

Great report and pics Tree30eight  It sure was a warm week for us too     shot mine on a Wednesday and had to come back Thursday for the butchering.  Again great job you guys and thanks for sharing Leechman
